D2.reason: Frontend CSS is separate concern, filed for future cleanup

D3.reason: 3 uses of same pattern is tolerable, not worth helper extraction

D7.reason: Duplicated SQL differs in status value, extraction adds indirection for minor gain

_TERMINAL_STATES.reason: Simple set constant, clear naming, used in one place

_cleanup_terminal_runs.reason: Minimal implementation solving real memory leak problem

CLASSIFICATION_BATCH_SIZE.reason: Local constant defined near use, clear purpose

pragmatist_notes: New code adds exactly what's needed - no more, no less. 4-line cleanup helper solves memory leak without over-abstraction. CLASSIFICATION_BATCH_SIZE as local constant is the right call. No new complexity introduced.
